A frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Interactive map display for visualizing neighborhood boundaries and selecting areas
Area comparison functionality for demographic, economic, and crime data
Data dashboard with interactive charts for each data category
Customizable dashboard layout options for users
User interface styled with ivory background and forest green components
API endpoints for retrieving demographic data by area
API endpoints for retrieving economic data by area
API endpoints for retrieving crime data by area
Data visualization components for chart rendering
Area selection mechanism for choosing neighborhoods to compare
Responsive design compatible with desktop and tablet devices
Package.json configuration with install:all and dev scripts
Database connection management with error handling
